interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: SAMYANG ABOUTME Red Recipe Super Cleansing Balm 3.04 oz. (90ml) - Soft Melting Milk Texture Makeup Cleansing Balm, Mineral Contained Nourishing & Soothing Cleansing, Rose Scented Review Date: 2019/12/30 Store: Samyang Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.66 x 3.39 x 2.36 inches; 5.57 Ounces'} Review Text: I tried this a few times and couldn't help but feeling like it left residue on my face. I end up using my normal face wash afterwards to feel properly cleansed.

To be fair I don't wear much face makeup so perhaps this might work better for someone that wears foundation. I did try to remove my eye makeup with this balm and it was too greasy/thick and also stung my eyes, whereas my micellar water won't do that.

The scent is a nice clean rose scent and I like the packaging, but I don't think I'll continue to use this. Seems like more work than is necessary and kinda makes me feel like it will clog my pores in the long run... Review Title: Feels like it creates an extra step... Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Remy Human Hair Pieces Front Clip in Hair #1B Natural Black Fringe Hair Extensions with Hair Temples {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Clip-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 1 x 1 inches; 0.48 Ounces', 'UPC': '615517482166'} I think this might work for people with smaller heads or smaller faces but I felt it wasn’t wider enough or thick enough to look good on me. The hair was very soft and real looking though! Not very much hair JPNK 10PCS Makeup tool set, Blender Sponges& Air cushion puff&Sponge Holder for Blending Liquid, Cream or Flawless Powder Cosmetics JPNK {'Brand': 'JPNK', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Foundation,Concealer,Blender', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 5.4 x 2.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} You never know what you're gonna get with some of these beauty sponges, but this is definitely one of the good sets.

The sponges are actually soft and don't absorb as much product as other sponges. I recently tried another brand that looked exactly the same but they were so hard and rubbery. These are soooo much softer in comparison. I don't feel like I'm softly punching my face like I do with the others😂

Very easy to clean, after use and have no weird smell or anything. I haven't used the puffs or brush yet but I'm going to attempt to use the puffs for powder or maybe even jelly products. The brush would probably work well for concealer or eyeshadow primer. It has soft bristles and a solid handle.

Overall I think this is an awesome quality set for a great price!! Higher quality beauty sponges than other brands! SAMYANG ABOUTME Red Recipe Super Cleansing Balm 3.04 oz. (90ml) - Soft Melting Milk Texture Makeup Cleansing Balm, Mineral Contained Nourishing & Soothing Cleansing, Rose Scented Samyang {'Package Dimensions': '3.66 x 3.39 x 2.36 inches; 5.57 Ounces'} I tried this a few times and couldn't help but feeling like it left residue on my face. I end up using my normal face wash afterwards to feel properly cleansed.

To be fair I don't wear much face makeup so perhaps this might work better for someone that wears foundation. I did try to remove my eye makeup with this balm and it was too greasy/thick and also stung my eyes, whereas my micellar water won't do that.

The scent is a nice clean rose scent and I like the packaging, but I don't think I'll continue to use this. Seems like more work than is necessary and kinda makes me feel like it will clog my pores in the long run... Feels like it creates an extra step...
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Hair Preferences:** Prefers natural-looking, high-quality hair extensions made from human hair.
- **Installation Method:** Favors clip-in extensions for ease of use.
- **Fit:** Has specific needs regarding size and thickness; prefers products that accommodate larger head sizes and provide adequate volume.
- **Quality Sensitivity:** Values softness and realism in hair products but requires sufficient density for a satisfactory appearance.
- **Rating Approach:** Exhibits a balanced view towards products, appreciating positives while providing critical feedback about shortcomings.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Experiences mixed feelings; has encountered products that meet some expectations but expresses dissatisfaction when products don’t fit well.
- **Makeup Preferences:** Recently demonstrated a keen interest in quality beauty tools, favoring soft, effective sponges for makeup application. Values ease of cleaning and low product absorption, indicating a preference for tools that enhance comfort and usability.
- **Satisfaction with Beauty Tools:** Displays enthusiasm for discovering high-quality beauty products. Recently found value in reliable performance and reasonable pricing.
- **Cleansing Product Preferences:** Shows a critical approach towards cleansing products, expressing dissatisfaction when a product feels inefficient or leaves residue. Prefers formulations that effectively remove makeup without irritation, indicating a desire for simplicity and efficacy in skincare routines.

This user prioritizes realistic appearances in hair extensions, comfort in beauty tools, and effective cleansing solutions that align with their minimalistic makeup approach.
